pages.text: Spell cooldowns are decreased by 10%. Spells that hit or affect an undead mob deal 4 damage in addition to their normal effects and may weaken the target. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_aegis)Path of the Aegis$()
